movies.title: Pettson & Findus - Tomtemaskinen
movies.plot: The old man PETTSON and his cat FINDUS live on a small farm way out in the countryside in Sweden. Christmas is approaching, and Pettson has given Findus the rash promise that THE TOMTE will come around with gifts for him at Christmas Eve. Pettson does not believe in the Tomte, but in order not to disappoint his cat, he decides to build an artificial Tomte - a mechanical TOMTE MACHINE. Pettson has a hard time keeping the project secret from Findus and getting the machine to actually work in due time. But somehow a mysterious magical force interferes...
movies.simplePlot: The old man PETTSON and his cat FINDUS live on a small farm way out in the countryside in Sweden. Christmas is approaching, and Pettson has given Findus the rash promise that THE TOMTE will...

biography.bio: Joachim Höppner was born on June 9, 1946 in Lübeck, Schleswig-Holstein, Germany. He was an actor, known for Pettson & Findus - Tomtemaskinen (2005), Aktenzeichen XY ungelöst (1967) and Straight Through the Heart (1983). He died on November 18, 2006 in Germering, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Joachim Höppner

biography.bio: Tord Peterson was born on April 21, 1926 in Danderyd, Stockholms län, Sweden as Tord Greger Pettersson. He is an actor, known for House of Angels (1992), Änglagård - Andra sommaren (1994) and Dragonflies (2001).
biography.name: Tord Peterson

biography.bio: Lukas Larsson is an actor, known for Pettson & Findus - Tomtemaskinen (2005).
biography.name: Lukas Larsson

biography.bio: Tobias John von Freyend was born on March 4, 1993. He is an actor, known for Pettson & Findus - Tomtemaskinen (2005), Lost Horizon (2010) and Die Wilden Kerle (2012).
biography.name: Tobias John von Freyend

biography.bio: Michael Habeck was born on April 23, 1944 in Grönenbach, Germany. He is known for his work on The Name of the Rose (1986), Rocks (2003) and The Bourne Identity (1988). He died on February 4, 2011 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Michael Habeck

biography.bio: Mona Seilitz was born on January 16, 1943 in Malmö, Skåne län, Sweden as Mona-Liz Alexandersson. She was an actress, known for Roofters (2004), Giliap (1975) and Julpussar och Stjärnsmällar (1986). She was married to Stefan Falk, Bill Öhrström and Jan-Erik Seilitz. She died on April 2, 2008 in Malmö.
biography.name: Mona Seilitz

biography.bio: Lars Knutzon was born on October 1, 1941 in Denmark. He is an actor and director, known for Gertrud (1964), Tidsrejsen (2014) and Det grå guld (2013).
biography.name: Lars Knutzon

biography.bio: Klaus Münster was born on September 3, 1935 in Bad Köstritz, Thuringia, Germany. He is an actor and writer, known for Shining Through (1992), Attention, papa arrive! (1991) and Die gläserne Zelle (1978).
biography.name: Klaus Münster

biography.bio: Gunnar Uddén is an actor, known for Pettson och Findus - Kattonauten (2000), Pettson & Findus - Tomtemaskinen (2005) and Arken (1965).
biography.name: Gunnar Uddén

biography.bio: Vigga Bro was born on October 20, 1937 in Fredericia, Denmark. She is an actress, known for Jul i Valhal (2005), Silent Heart (2014) and Minor Mishaps (2002). She was previously married to Erik Moseholm, Hans Henrik Clemensen, Bendt Rothe and Fritz Brun.
biography.name: Vigga Bro

biography.bio: Monika John was born on May 31, 1935 in Berlin, Germany. She is an actress, known for Lissi und der wilde Kaiser (2007), The Devil Strikes at Night (1957) and Pflicht ist Pflicht (1966).
biography.name: Monika John

biography.bio: Andreas Nilsson was born in 1964 in Södertälje, Stockholms län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Illusive Tracks (2003), The Stig-Helmer Story (2011) and Pettson & Findus - Tomtemaskinen (2005).
biography.name: Andreas Nilsson

biography.bio: Birgitta Andersson was born on April 20, 1933 in Mariestad, Västra Götalands län, Sweden as Ulla Birgitta Helena Andersson. She is an actress, known for Roofters (2004), Gumman som blev liten som en tesked (1967) and Trolltider (1979).
biography.name: Birgitta Andersson

biography.bio: Anita Höfer was born on February 27, 1944 in Stuttgart, Germany. She is an actress, known for Angry Harvest (1985), Graf Öderland (1968) and Ein Frauenarzt klagt an (1964).
biography.name: Anita Höfer

biography.bio: Niclas Ekholm is an actor, known for Pettson & Findus - Tomtemaskinen (2005) and The Blueberry War (2007).
biography.name: Niclas Ekholm
